job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of building scalable software solutions, specifically mentioning cloud environments and integration with data platforms, fitting Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop projects through proof-of-concept, pilot and full deployment phases.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase outlines the software development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment, which falls under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Further develop the AI components in our data platform to improve our technical infrastructure, standards of working and tool stack.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on improving existing technical infrastructure and components within a data platform, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions integrating models with applications and managing their communication via APIs and database queries, which is a key aspect of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the need to communicate technical information to stakeholders and explain complex concepts, which is a clear indicator of Communication & Collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves experimenting with new technologies and data to identify use cases, which relates to the development and application of models, fitting Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on software engineering tasks (building scalable solutions, integration, development phases, improving infrastructure) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions AI/model-based solutions and experimenting with new technologies, the core responsibilities are about integrating and developing these solutions within a broader software context, rather than deep specialization in model development or GenAI specifics. The emphasis is on building and integrating AI components into existing systems and applications, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a mix of business understanding, software development, integration, and some experimentation. The tasks are well-defined, and the technologies mentioned are standard. The primary focus leans heavily towards software engineering with AI integration, making the profile assignment straightforward. A slightly lower score is given because the ad doesn't explicitly mention Generative AI specific tasks like prompt engineering or RAG, but rather 'AI / model based solutions' which could encompass traditional ML as well. However, the integration and development aspects are very clear.
